price: 当她到来的时候，有人说：“你的宝座像这样吗？”她说：“这好像是我的宝座。”在她之前，我们已获得知识，我们已是归顺的。
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ قِيلَ أَهَٰكَذَا عَرۡشُكِۖ قَالَتۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلۡعِلۡمَ مِن قَبۡلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāat qīla ahākadhā ʿarshuki qālat ka-annahu huwa waūtīnā al-ʿil'ma min qablihā wakunnā mus'limīna
